name: CreateOktaAccount
description:
Create an Okta account via Datadog integration.

Use this tool to create a new Okta account through Datadog's API integration. This is useful when setting up user accounts for Okta within the Datadog platform.

parameters.name: okta_auth_method
parameters.description: Specify the authorization method for the Okta account.

value_schema.description: The authorization method for an Okta account.

parameters.name: okta_account_domain
parameters.description: The domain of the Okta account to be created.

value_schema.description: The domain of the Okta account.

parameters.name: okta_account_name
parameters.description: The name of the Okta account to be created via Datadog API integration.

value_schema.description: The name of the Okta account.

parameters.name: okta_account_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of account for the Okta account. The value should be 'okta-accounts'.

value_schema.description: Account type for an Okta account.

parameters.name: okta_api_key
parameters.description: The API key for the Okta account integration. This key is used for authenticating the account with Datadog.

value_schema.description: The API key of the Okta account.

parameters.name: okta_client_id
parameters.description: The Client ID for the Okta app integration, necessary for the account setup.

value_schema.description: The Client ID of an Okta app integration.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: The client secret associated with the Okta app integration. This is required for authentication.

value_schema.description: The client secret of an Okta app integration.

parameters.name: okta_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Okta account, which is a UUID hash of the account name.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Okta account, a UUID hash of the account name.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.description: The API key of the Okta account.

value_schema.description: The API key of the Okta account.

value_schema.description: The authorization method for an Okta account.

value_schema.description: The Client ID of an Okta app integration.

parameters.name: data.attributes.client_secret
parameters.description: The client secret of an Okta app integration.

value_schema.description: The client secret of an Okta app integration.

parameters.description: The domain of the Okta account.

value_schema.description: The domain of the Okta account.

parameters.name: data.attributes.name
parameters.description: The name of the Okta account.

value_schema.description: The name of the Okta account.

parameters.description: Account type for an Okta account.

value_schema.description: Account type for an Okta account.
